ygData.subject: Re: Research Tips
ygData.msgSnippet: u can research spells thats higher than your level... but the chance of getting it is low... also research is not easy at all... the worst part being finding
ygData.messageBody:
u can research spells thats higher than your level... but the chance of
getting it is low...

also research is not easy at all... the worst part being finding the
words... imagine that a level 49 spell word can only be found in the cazic
thule hiumself... how the hell to ever get my level 49 pet? even if i get
it... theres a high chance i will fail to make the spell... so think bout
it? still easy? hehe...

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: Tommy Fong <tommyfong@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 8:28 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Research Tips


> From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
>
> Research must be the easiest kill in the game. U just have to put all
your point(and
> $$$) and max it before doing any research. Oh... u can't research any
spell that is
> higher than your current lvl.
>
> On Thu, 19 Aug 1999 10:47:14 +0900, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy wrote:
>
> >From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> >what i have learnt from some experienced folks... just dump everything i
u
> >have into research... since theres a limit ... dont think will take up
all
> >ya points also... unless u have tons of runes to use... when im level
20...
> >i almost suceed in making level 16 words all the time... like u said 80%
> >lor... but if i try level 20 spells... then theres high chance i will
> >fail... although its possible that a level 16 suceed in getting level 20
> >spells... so... conclusion DUMP EVERYTHING IN
> >
> >Nic
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 10:19 AM
> >Subject: [sg-everquest] Research Tips
> >
> >
> >> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >>
> >> Anyone got any reseach tips to share? How to train it and how much
skill
> >u
> >> need b4 u got a high chance (say 80%) to research a particular lvl
spell?
> >>

got
> >> all the necessary spells (as a nuker and traveller) I need, either
buying
> >> from wiz guild or getting from 'some' other sources ;)
> >>
> >> Say now I never train or use research skill b4, shld I dump in max
skill
> >> points (and pay pp also) to max out the skill 1st, or ???
> >>
> >> TIA!
> >>
> >> Ziltus
> >>

flat

and

weekend
